boardgame.name: El Curso de la Historia
The Flow of History
The Flow of History: Deluxified
Krótka Historia Cywilizacji
歷史長流
boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;History is a harsh river that flows steadily through the ages. Since the dawn of time, numerous civilizations have risen over the fallen ashes of others, and yet every one of them had once shone brightly in its own moment of glory!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Flow of History is yet another innovative civilization game from Taiwanese designer Jesse Li. Players develop their nation using a unique bidding/price-setting mechanism to purchase new cards, but what is paid to the supply might also be harvested into the pockets of other players later, which puts a twist on your strategy of bidding cards, and also simulates economic inflation in the game. Don't forget to build a formidable military to clash with cultures led by your enemy, and create an unforgettable tale of your civilization in The Flow of History._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: BGP 019: What Has Us Excited about 2018 pt.1
Episode 51 :: Mansions of Madness Review + Interview with Tony Gullotti of Arcane Wonders

The Good the Board and the Hattanooga Choo Choo Episode 163 Train Games
The Good The Board and The Nailed to the Plus Sign: Episode 114 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Math_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Includes: The Flow of History Deluxified™ Metal Coins Plastic Insert Tray Game Board All Unlocked Stretch Goals everything New and unopened/sealed The game is (supposedly) available March 2018. I will ship right after Arrival. Tracking No. is provided. Transport is insured till 500€ Personal Pickup possible Germany 6,99 all EU 20,99 Europe without EU (incl. Russia) 38,99 USA 54,99 World 62,99 Payment: IBAN (free of Charge) or PayPal payment (PayPal +2€ within EU, or EX-EU 5%) I am a trusted BG-Geek! see my ratings and profile. If you have any Questions send me a Geekmail
